caption.p: Dependence of the RD of A. artemisiifolia seedlings measured as 1/(time from the appearance of the first and seventh pair of stem leaves) on temperature; continuous line and black triangles indicate 100 % Knop solution, dashed line and grey squares 50 % solution, dotted line and white diamonds 10 % solution and bars indicate SD; for the regression equations, coefficient of determination ( R 2) and calculated values—LDT and SET, see Table 1.
